exercise.question: I enjoy rock music.
I didn't get any sleep.
I've been to quite a few festivals.
I used to go to a free festival.
I didn't really enjoy the experience.

script.line: Yes, several, yes. I've been to Reading and Glastonbury, I can't remember the others, but there have been some other smaller ones as well, a few years ago. They were excellent yeah, what I remember. They were good, very good.
I've been to see Tina Turner at Wembley who was absolutely fantastic, she has so much energy and vitality - it's incredible. And I've also seen Status Quo, so I'm quite into kind of rock.
Yes, I've been to Reading and to Download. Mad, mad, just staying up all night listening to music with all your friends, having a few beverages, and just having a good time. Very fun!

Yes. Well, years ago when it was a free and open thing, I used to go down to Stonehenge, which was pretty wild I have to say, and I think what I recall then, bikers, Hell's Angels, and all sorts of others, doing security, police didn't want to know. Aside from that, Led Zeppelin at Knebworth Park, you know, a few things like that.
